name: Twitter 1000 Followers !! 1000 editions for 1 tez !!
description: Can't believe this...I've reached 1000 followers! I'm incredibly humbled. Thank you so much to everyone who's supported my work. I painted walls for 25 years out of my love for graffiti and met so many amazing people. We never had a way to make money for our art. NFTs have finally given us that chance. For 1000 days of inhaling posinious spray paint fumes. Here's a special 1000 NFT. I will burn this NFT as soon as I reach 1100 followers!!
